sections.title: Questions - Design, Development & Cybersecurity Risk Management - Article 13

questions.title: Design and Compliance - Q1
questions.content: Has the product with digital elements (PDE) been **designed, developed, and produced** in compliance with the **essential cybersecurity requirements** outlined in Annex I, Part I?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Cybersecurity Risk Assessment - Q1
questions.content: Have you **assessed cybersecurity risks** across all lifecycle phases (from design to maintenance)?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Cybersecurity Risk Assessment - Q2
questions.content: Does this assessment ensure that risks are **minimized and incidents are prevented**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Risk Assessment Documentation - Q1
questions.content: Is the **cybersecurity risk assessment documented and regularly updated** throughout the support period?

questions.title: Risk Assessment Documentation - Q2
questions.content: Does it include intended and foreseeable use, operational conditions, and expected duration?

responses.title: In Progress

questions.title: Risk Assessment Documentation - Q3
questions.content: Does it describe how **Annex I cybersecurity and vulnerability-handling measures** are implemented?

responses.title: In Progress

questions.title: Risk Assessment Documentation - Q4

questions.title: Inclusion in Technical Documentation - Q1
questions.content: Is the **risk assessment included** in the **technical documentation**, as required by Article 31 and Annex VII?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Integration of Third-Party Components - Q1
questions.content: Do you exercise **due diligence** when integrating third-party or open-source components to ensure they do not compromise cybersecurity?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Vulnerability Reporting & Cooperation - Q1
questions.content: When vulnerabilities are found in components, do you **report them to the component maintainer** or responsible party?

questions.title: Vulnerability Reporting & Cooperation - Q2
questions.content: Do you **remediate** vulnerabilities appropriately and **share fixes or code** with maintainers when relevant?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Systematic Documentation - Q1
questions.content: Do you **systematically document** all cybersecurity aspects, including discovered vulnerabilities, risk analyses, and updates?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Systematic Documentation - Q2
questions.content: Is this documentation **proportionate** to the product’s risk level and kept current?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Vulnerability Handling & Support Period - Q1
questions.content: Are vulnerabilities **handled effectively throughout the support period**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Vulnerability Handling & Support Period - Q2
questions.content: Have you determined and justified the **support period duration** (minimum 5 years)?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Vulnerability Handling & Support Period - Q3
questions.content: Do you maintain formal **policies and procedures**, including a **Coordinated Vulnerability Disclosure (CVD)** policy?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Availability of Security Updates - Q1
questions.content: Are all **security updates** made available for **at least 10 years** or for the full support period, whichever is longer?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Substantially Modified Software Versions - Q1
questions.content: If a substantially modified software version is released, do you ensure previous users can **upgrade to the latest version** free of charge and without additional compatibility costs?

questions.title: Public Software Archives - Q1
questions.content: If you maintain **public archives of older software versions**, do you **clearly inform users** of the **security risks** of using unsupported versions?

questions.title: Conformity Assessment & CE Marking - Q1
questions.content: Before placing the product on the market, have you completed all steps of **technical documentation, conformity assessment**, issued an **EU Declaration of Conformity**, and **affixed the CE marking**?

questions.title: Retention of Documentation - Q1
questions.content: Do you **retain all technical documentation and EU Declarations of Conformity** for at least **10 years** or the entire **support period**, whichever is longer?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Ongoing Compliance for Series Production - Q1
questions.content: Do you maintain **ongoing conformity** for series-produced products, accounting for changes in design, production, or standards?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Product Identification - Q1
questions.content: Does each product carry a **type, batch, or serial number**, or equivalent traceable identifier on the product, its packaging, or accompanying documents?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Manufacturer Contact Details - Q1
questions.content: Have you provided the **manufacturer’s name, trade name, postal address, digital contact information, and website** (if available) on the product, packaging, or documentation?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Manufacturer Contact Details - Q2
questions.content: Are these details presented in a **language easily understood** by both users and authorities?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Single Point of Contact (SPOC) - Q1
questions.content: Have you designated a **Single Point of Contact (SPOC)** for users to report vulnerabilities and communicate directly?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Single Point of Contact (SPOC) - Q2
questions.content: Is the SPOC **clearly identifiable**, supports **multiple communication channels**, and does **not rely solely on automation**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: User Information & Instructions (Annex II) - Q1
questions.content: Have you provided **user information and instructions** (Annex II) in **paper or electronic form**, written in a **clear, understandable language**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: User Information & Instructions (Annex II) - Q2
questions.content: Do these instructions enable **secure installation, operation, and use** of the product?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: User Information & Instructions (Annex II) - Q3
questions.content: Are they **accessible and retained for at least 10 years** (or for the support period), even when hosted online?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Disclosure of Support Period - Q1
questions.content: Is the **end date of the support period** (month and year) **clearly communicated at the time of purchase**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Disclosure of Support Period - Q2
questions.content: Where feasible, is this date also displayed on the **product, packaging, or digitally**?

questions.title: Disclosure of Support Period - Q3
questions.content: Do users receive a **notification** when the product’s support period ends (if technically feasible)?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: EU Declaration of Conformity - Q1
questions.content: Does each product include either a **full EU Declaration of Conformity** or a **simplified version** that provides a **direct internet link** to the full declaration?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Corrective Measures for Non-Conformity - Q1
questions.content: If you **know or suspect** a product or its processes no longer meet CRA requirements, do you **immediately correct**, **withdraw**, or **recall** the affected product?

questions.title: Cooperation with Market Authorities - Q1
questions.content: Upon a **reasoned request**, can you provide **all documentation and information** (in an understandable language) to demonstrate conformity?

questions.title: Cooperation with Market Authorities - Q2
questions.content: Do you **cooperate fully with authorities** to remove or mitigate any identified cybersecurity risks?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Cessation of Operations - Q1
questions.content: If you plan to **cease operations**, do you **inform authorities and users in advance**, explaining the cessation and its effects on product support?

questions.title: Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) Format - Q1
questions.content: Are you prepared to provide a **Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)** that follows the **standard format and structure** defined by the European Commission?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Union-Wide Dependency Assessment - Q1
questions.content: If requested by **ADCO or authorities**, can you provide **SBOMs** for inclusion in a Union-wide dependency assessment?

questions.title: Union-Wide Dependency Assessment - Q2
questions.content: Are you aware that only **anonymized and aggregated SBOM data** will be shared by authorities with the Cooperation Group under **NIS2**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.
